welcome_message_body: Welcome to Tredyffrin, where history and charm come together to create a unique experience. Explore our beautiful parks, delicious dining options, and historic landmarks. Enjoy your stay and embrace all that our city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Pottstown/Limerick Airport caters to private and charter flights, providing a more exclusive and personalized experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A-West
terminals.description: The newest terminal at PHL, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal A-East
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at PHL, currently undergoing renovations.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: Serving domestic and international flights, with a wide variety of dining and shopping options.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The main terminal at PHL, with a variety of airlines and amenities.

terminals.name: Terminal D
terminals.description: Serving mostly international flights, with a focus on luxury and comfort.

terminals.name: Terminal E
terminals.description: The newest terminal at PHL, serving domestic and international flights with a focus on sustainability.

wifi.note: Limited to 30 minutes per device, per day. Upgrade options available for longer access.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Willow Grove NAS Airport handles all cargo and freight operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Chestercounty Carlson Airport handles all freight and cargo shipments.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at North Philadelphia Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at North Philadelphia Airport handles all cargo and freight operations for the airport.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Upper Bucks Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal is dedicated to private flights and offers a more luxurious and exclusive experience.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
